content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assessment is a process of employee evaluation according to a global competency framework. International committees of experts recommend candidates for promotion to a particular job function and level. Assessment is a necessary step in your career growth. Starting from the third level (A3), assessment is a mandatory procedure for moving to the next level. Requirements for different levels can be found\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://competency.epam.com/jobFunction\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMASMT/.NET\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" if your key specialization is .NET.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The experts participating in the assessment are employees of the company, just like you. Any employee, starting from the A3 level and more than half a year in the company, as well as more than half a year at the A3 level, can become a member of an expert committee. This helps the company globally and helps employees in their growth. Of course, this will also contribute to your own growth because an expert should always be focused on improving and maintaining their knowledge. During the sessions, you have the chance to talk with candidates on various topics and learn something for yourself by looking at various aspects from a different angle. We invite you to join our community!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The moment you decide that you are ready for the next level, the first thing to do is to discuss this with your resource manager to decide whether to start preparing for assessment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you have decided that you are ready, the next step will most often be preparing a presentation – a kind of resume that will highlight your relevant experience, knowledge, and achievements, which will help the expert committee to better understand the context of what exactly you have been doing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pre-Assessment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are not confident in your abilities, and especially if this is your first assessment, there is a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1470631494\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"pre-assessment procedure\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that will allow you to better understand the assessment process and help you in preparing for it. You can discuss this with your resource manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Changes in the assessment process\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The assessment process is constantly subject to revision and various changes. One of the last important innovations is the option to pass assessment without preparing a presentation. In this case, the process is more like a regular technical interview, where the committee’s questions will rely less on the experience and context of the candidate, instead checking against general expectations for the particular level and position. It should be noted that this option does not exist for all levels and positions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More
